Articles.Content:
Hello! 

Dear Squad,

Are you ever planning to add the Ability to Paint Aircraft? This is the ONE thing I ask. Plz.. Every dang Plane and Rocket is the Same color!

Please!! ?

I know..Kerp Paint and Believe me I loved it when it worked. 

Anyone else with me on this? 

Thanks. 

GKz

I think KerbPaint is under new management.  The author came back and reissued a more open license.  That was the only thing holding everyone back from doing anything with it.

Edited April 27, 2016 by Alshain

Thanks Alshain,

As you are the only one who responded to this post..this plea..I guess most ppl ( 61 views)  don't care if every single plane and rocket is the same color as every other rocket and Plane.

peace

GKz
It would be cool but I would like other features first, like a bigger spaceplane hanger and stock clouds
Yes, this is something I'd like to see in stock, and I would certainly use it.  I just don't want it enough atm to consider installing the mod.
I think most people prefer the stock black/white scheme.
I`d like to make parts different colours, small parts particularly.

Overall I think vessels would look best in the 'traditional' mostly white colours, but it would be nice to be able to change it if I wanted.  It would be good to be able 'colour code' ships by giving them different coloured radial tanks etc.

20 hours ago, scifi6546 said:

It would be cool but I would like other features first, like a bigger spaceplane hanger and stock clouds

Or a working game without stutters and random explosions. Now THAT would be a feature.

Quote

Or a working game without stutters and random explosions. Now THAT would be a feature.

Ksp runs so good for me..not a single stutter or explosion(that i did not cause). 

Just want some color in game.

GKz
